programme.desc: Space Invaders, Part 2: Captain Man & Kid Danger discover who has taken the astronauts hostage. After realizing the astronauts are not so innocent, their alleigances change. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton needs more help stealing the secret formula in 'Plankton's Intern', then in 'Patrick's Tantrum', Patrick gets angry whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward are sent to collect unpaid bills in 'Bubble Bass's Tab', then in 'Kooky Cooks', Spongebob and Squidward cook a fancy meal for Mrs. Puff, but every dish becomes a dispute.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: He Said She Said: Alvin and Brittany give Miss Smith wildly different versions of why the fire alarm went off at school.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Tables Turned: When Alvin pranks Simon with a trick website making it look like Alvin is smarter, the chipettes prank Alvin back.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Crow That Ate My Homework: Dave promises to take Alvin to a water park if he gets a good grade on his test, but then a crow steals it. (S4, ep 4b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Chimpmania: Jeanette and the Chipmunks orchestrate a break-in at Bocarter's house to rescue a chimpanzee he keeps in a cage. (S4, ep 19a)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Mrs. Puff gives swimming lessons to Patrick in 'Pat's A Li'l Sinker', then in 'Camp SpongeBob', SpongeBob finds himself all alone in the camp, but that doesn't stop him from having a blast. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: It's the annual foam-fisted all-camp karate battle in 'Hill Fu', then in 'Sun's Out, Fun's Out', It's the hottest day of summer, but there's only one AC in the whole camp. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn tries to control her future in 'Crystal Ballin'', and then in 'Most Dangerous Gamer', Lincoln and crew try to beta test a new game. (S9, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori and Bobby find a kitten in 'Meet the Purrents', then in 'Apartment Complex', after telling her family how great her apartment is, Lori's sisters secretly take over her space. (S9, ep 3)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Patrick suddenly grows a beard, he decides it's time to act like a grown-up in 'Squidward's School For Grown-Ups', and then in 'Oral Report', SpongeBob must face his fear of public speaking.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tries to befriend Squidward to steal the Krabby Patty formula in 'Sweet and Sour Squidward', and then in 'The Googly Artiste', Patrick's painted rocks with googly eyes are an artistic hit.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Shattered: Sonic fights Dr. Eggman and loses. He wakes up in New Yoke City-a nightmare world ruled by Dr. Eggman and where his "best friend", Tails, is a loner called Nine. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Prank War - Part 1: An ancient Prank War re-ignites between Swellview and Rivalton, and ShoutOut's excellent sense for pranking is Danger Force's best hope for winning the conflict. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: From Dust Till Dawn: Chloe is struggling with her leadership skills, but when a villain attacks her school field trip, Max and Phoebe have to put Chloe in charge. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Thundercover: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town for longer. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Spelling Bee Hard: Dr. Minyak challenges Captain Man to a Spelling Bee. (S4, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Man-kini: When a new internet celebrity is causing havoc in Swellview, Captain Man has to body swap with Frankini to infiltrate his secret lair. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Three Girls and a Moose: Tori, Cat and Jade compete with each other to win the affection of Beck's big, handsome, hockey loving Canadian friend, Moose. (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Tori Fixes Beck & Jade: Beck wants to ask a girl out but is worried about Jade, so Tori and Andre get Jade a date too. Robbie helps Cat with a butterfly that's stuck in her ear. (S3, ep 20)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Robbie Sells Rex: Mason Thornesmith's bratty 12 year-old kid wants to buy Rex from Robbie. Meanwhile, a masked flour thrower is on the loose in Hollywood Arts. (S3, ep 21)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Favourite Show: Sam and Cat babysit two boys - one asks a lot of questions, the other can't stop hugging. The girls try to save their favourite TV show from being cancelled. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: New Goat: Sam and Cat babysit a goat while trying to win over their landlord's obnoxious son who is trying to get the girls evicted. Dice starts managing Goomer, an MMA fighter. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Side-Kicking and Screaming: Max & Phoebe secretly employ their parents' former sidekick to ease their busy schedule, but the twins' bickering provokes an unexpected response. (S4, ep 25)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cookie Mistake: After Phoebe chooses Billy to accompany her to their favourite cookie factory's tasting event, Max and Nora are determined to sneak in first. (S4, ep 26)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: All the President's Thunder-Men: After their requests drive Kickbutt to quit, Max and Phoebe get what they want when Hank is made SuperPresident. But being the First Family takes its toll. (S4, ep 32)

programme.desc: Deuce's presentation runs off the rails in 'Oh Rats', and in 'Fired Up', Heath tries to outdo Jinafire. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats life-threatening chum, SpongeBob helps him with his 'Chum Bucket List', then in 'Big Baby Patrick', Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Piranicus Race: Enki struggles to be more 'normal'...to the point of forgetting the Thousand Waterfalls race! But the Tikis need his ideas to escape the vicious Piranicus fish... (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Hack-San: What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain? (S4 Ep16)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Rocketear: As Guardian of the Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions which affect the people around her. (S4 Ep17)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Mess: Bad luck! L.J. breaks a Shard-embedded mirror so Jade becomes a trouble magnet while tracking the Shard. Worse, the evil Crimson Lord is back in town. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Talk: The Crimson Lord uses a Shard-embedded megaphone to steal voices, including L.J.'s. Mute before she's in the suit, Jade plays videos of herself training. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Robostus: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Robostus, an akumatized robot. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Sapotis: Ladybug faces small, out-of-control monsters named Sapotis. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Ready for the Rush!: Yuga Ohdo may seem like any other 5th grader in Goha City, but he's about to take his favourite game to the next level by inventing a whole new way to duel - Rush Duels! (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Not for the Paint of Heart: When Izzy believes that Chef wants her to "Rise to the Challenge" of destroying the daycare with art, she gets some magic paint to bring her creations to life. (S3 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Daycare of Rock: After believing he's turned Chef to stone Duncan sets his sights on ultimate chaos only to discover there's no joy in victory without an adversary. (S3 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas - Part 1: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas PT2: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Aches & Ladders: When MacArthur has a bad fall in the school, the kids' recollections of the event are just as weird as they are. (S3 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cactus Makes Perfect: Cody's friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus. (S3 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Virtual Reality Bites: When the school switches to virtual reality, Harold uses the opportunity to get the respect he feels he rightfully deserves. (S3 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Opening Act: After failing to open a jar Chef believes he's entering his twilight years. This prompts Beth and the kids to dig up something from his youth to rejuvenate him. (S3 Ep40)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: The Future King of Duels: Luke challenges Yuga to a Rush Duel to prove that he's the future King of Duels! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Don't Anger the God of Destruction! The Heart Pounding Birthday Party: An uninvited guest crashes Bulma's party. Vegeta becomes plagued by memories of Beerus' visit to his home planet. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: School District 9: When a career-predicting machine tells Owen he has no skills to offer the world, Owen finds a way to prove the machine wrong in the most Owen way possible. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gumbearable: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum, Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into a gum volcano. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Whack Mirror: Chef warns Beth and Cody that making goofy faces into a mirror will cause them to get stuck that way. It turns out he was right, just not in the way any of them ever imagined. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Broken Back Kotter: Izzy nominates Chef for the Daycare Professional of the Year award and will do whatever it takes to see him win. As it turns out, it takes a lot. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Weekend at Buddy's: After Cody's best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: MacArthur Park: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Last Mom Standing: When Chef's mum and Leshawna's grandmother drop their loved ones off at the same time, it kicks off a dangerous competition for who is the most caring mother figure. (S3 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Carmageddon: Duncan is rattled when Chef, tired of having his car destroyed, buys a new one that is completely indestructible. (S3 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Double Oh Beth: With most of the class already gone for spring break, a villain infiltrates the school. Luckily a sleeper agent has been lying in wait. Hold on... it's Beth?!? Oh boy... (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Duty: When Duncan realises Chef is getting kids to tattle on him in return for chocolate milk, he sees an opportunity. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Encore'tney: When Courtney turns to a magical datebook to help her achieve perfection, she's trapped in a never-ending loop until a friend teaches her a valuable lesson. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Life Of Pie: When Izzy, Jude and Owen accidentally bring a pizza to life they do everything they can to help it find a new purpose in life, other than being eaten. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Annedroids
programme.desc: Magnetic Pal: Nick's best friend Zack comes over for a sleepover when Anne is in the middle of an experiment on magnetism. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Race: Miss Primrose accelerates the students' training by sending them to an advanced obstacle course. But will competition get in the way? (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mind in a Whirl: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzy is in love with thinks she's a lemming. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am awyrennau yn y bennod yma, a phwy wnaeth ddyfeisio ac adeiladu'r awyren gyntaf. We'll learn about Aeroplanes in this episode, and about who invented the first one.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Cain yn edrych allan am flodyn arbennig... blodyn enfys! On today's poptastic adventure, Fly is on the lookout for a very special flower - a rainbow flower!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble ddaw hadau blodau haul. Mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd nhw i Fferm Fach am dro. Nel and Guto want to know where Sunflower seeds come from.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Yng ngardd y parc mae'r Capten yn dyfrio'r pridd i Seren blannu hadau. Ond pa flodyn sydd wedi tyfu yno'n barod? In the park, the Captain is watering the soil so Seren can plant some seeds.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n cuddio ei hen degan cnoi cyn i Esyllt ei weld a gwneud hwyl am ei ben am fod ganddo degan babi. Stiw tries to hide his old teething ring before Esyllt discovers it.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae'n ben-blwydd ar Plwmp heddiw. Mae wedi derbyn anrheg anarferol, allwedd! It's Plwmp's birthday today. He has received an unusual gift, a key!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Francois yn gwneud cerflun allan o slwtsh slefren ar gyfer Sioe Gelf Porth yr Haul. Francois is making a sculpture from jellyfish jam slush for Porth yr Haul's Art Show.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Taith llong o Gaernarfon i Abersoch a geir tro yma. Mae hi'n llong anarferol iawn, gan mai hwyaden yw ei chapten! A traditional Welsh song about a ship's journey from Caernarfon to Abersoch.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Ar l i'r Garddwr gael damwain a thorri ei goes, mae Twm Twrch a'i ffrindiau yn penderfynu ei helpu a gofalu amdano. Twm Twrch and his friends decide to help and look after the gardener.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Ar l cael ei fesur, mae Bledd yn deffro i ddarganfod efallai ei fod wedi tyfu gormod. After being measured, Bledd wakes up to discover he may have grown too much.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Pwti'n dal pili-pala er mwyn ei hastudio. Ond pan mae fe'i hunan yn gorfod aros tu mewn, mae'n sylweddoli bod neb yn hoffi cael eu caethiwo. Pwti traps a butterfly in a jar, oh-no!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd 'r criw printio - Melyn, Gwyrddlas a Majenta! Meet the Printing Crew - Yellow, Cyan and Magenta!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ac anifeiliaid bach y byd, ac yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn dod i nabod yr arth wen a'r mircat. In this programme, we get to know the polar bear and the meercat.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto a'i ffrindiau'n mynd ar antur i flasu'r blodau dant y llew melysaf yn y byd. Guto and his friends set out to taste the sweetest dandelions in the world.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw: ofn lifft y siop bob dim! Mae'n rhaid iddo fo a'r anifeiliaid drio lledfu eu hofn. Pablo is scared of the lift at the department store.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Tro hwn, cawn edrych ar sut mae technoleg wedi newid ein bywydau, gan wneud pethau yn haws ac yn fwy cyfleus nag erioed o'r blaen. We look at how technology at home has changed our lives.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn mynd i wneud sioe hud a lledrith gwych! On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper is putting on a spectacular magic show!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble mae ml yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd nhw i Fferm Fach am dro ac am wers. Nel and Guto want to know where Honey comes from.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Yr wythnos hon, mae Scott yn rhoi cynnig ar arlunio byw, yn cartio ac yn cael gwers arwyddo Makaton. This week Scott tries out life drawing, karting and has a Makaton signing lesson. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n ymweld champfa Jiu Jitsu Aberteleri, ac yma'n westai mae'r pel-droediwr, Megan Bowen. We visit the Abertillery Jiu Jitsu gym, and footballer, Megan Bowen, is a guest on the sofa.

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Cyfres wedi'i chyflwyno gan Heledd Cynwal, gyda llu o arbenigwyr wrth gefn. Cawn helpu 4 teulu sy'n ysu am gael gi - pa fath fydd yn eu siwtio? We help 4 families find their perfect dog.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, yr artist serameg Lowri Davies sy'n canolbwyntio ar gynrychioli yr AS Liz Saville Roberts mewn celfyddyd. This time ceramicist Lowri Davies portrays MP Liz Saville Roberts in art.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Mae Nerys yn coginio'r pysgod a sglods perffaith, mae'r Clwb Clecs yma, ac edrychwn ymlaen at Wyl Tawe. Nerys cooks fish and chips, the Clwb Clecs are here, and we look forward to Gwyl Tawe.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Joe Allen: Y Chwiban Olaf
programme.desc: Rhaglen yn dilyn Joe Allen wrth iddo wynebu penderfyniad caletaf ei yrfa - dal ati i chwarae neu cerdded i ffwrdd. Documentary following Joe Allen through a season like no other.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Pinc hywliog yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Fun Pink arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Mae'n rhaid iddo stopio'r Llowciwr Oglau rhag llyncu popeth! Pablo and friends stop The Smell Gobbler eating all the smells in the house.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Bini yn mynd a Fflamia allan i'r goedwig i orffen ei hyfforddiant ci-ffw pan mae storm yn codi. The Crew have to carry out a rescue mission from a dangerous ravine.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae afalau yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Apples come from.

programme.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
programme.desc: Mae Dai wrth ei fodd ei fod o a'i deulu'n mynd ar wyliau ac yn hedfan am y tro cyntaf erioed. Dave's first ever plane journey doesn't quite go to plan and his head swells.

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Pan mae ffrind gorau Bob, Gummy yn mynd ar goll, mae Lloyd ac Abacus yn ymgymryd 'r dasg o ddod o hyd iddo. Lloyd suspects foul play when Gummy goes missing and compiles a list of suspects.

programme.title: Prosiect Z
programme.desc: Heddiw mae'r Zeds wedi cyrraedd Ysgol Brynrefail. A fydd y pum disgybl yn dianc neu'n cael eu troi yn Zeds? Today the Zeds have arrived at Ysgol Brynrefail. Will the youngsters escape?

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Bois y Rhondda
programme.desc: Yn dilyn y rhaglen ddiweddar, Bois y Rhondda, dyma gyfres sy'n dilyn anturiaethau'r criw wrth iddynt wynebu heriau nesa bywyd. Vibrant series about the adventures of the young Rhondda crew.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn rhannu tips am gadw'r ardd lysiau yn gynhyrchiol, ac mae Meinir efo Stifyn Parri yn ei ardd yn San Ffagan. Rhys Rowlands challenges our view of how to use rhubarb in the kitchen.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.desc: Gm Ragbrofol Ewropeaidd Grwp J Cwpan y Byd FIFA '26: Cymru v Liechtenstein. C/G 19.45. '26 FIFA World Cup Group J European Qualifier: Wales v Liechtenstein. Cardiff City Stadium. K/O 19.45.

programme.title: New: Ar Led
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd gyda Miriam Isaac a Carwyn Blayneysy'n archwilio pob agwedd o iechyd rhywiol ac addysg rhyw. New series exploring every aspect of sexual health and sex education.

programme.title: Y Llinell Las
programme.desc: Mae Arwel a Chris ar drywydd ymwelwyr sy'n gyrru'n beryglus, a Jason yn arwain ymgyrch i annog beicwyr modur i yrru'n saff. The team focus on safe driving & Gethin gets pushed to the max.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wedi i Guto ddeall fod ei dad un tro wedi cwympo i ardd Mr Puw mewn peiriant hedfan, mae'n benderfynol o ddod o hyd i'r peiriant yma! Guto goes in search of a flying machine.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu, i droi sbwriel yn sbeshal a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins pupils from Ysgol Gynradd Llanfairpwllgwyngyll, to create a superb treasure.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond pan mae o'n gweld pry copyn dychrynllyd mewn llyfr, mae o'n rhedeg i ffwrdd. Beth sydd i'w wneud? Today, Pablo is quite scared by a spider!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghoedwig yr Olobob yn gyffrous i glywed Norbet yn dweud jcs yn ei Sioe Ddigri, ond mae'r gynulleidfa yn anodd ei phlesio! Can the Olobobs help Norbet find his funny bone?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Gwich a'i frawd yn mynd charafn Crawc ar daith drwy gefn gwlad buan iawn mae ffrae yn codi rhwng y brodyr. Sibling jealousies rise to the surface when Gwich goes on holiday.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Ar l cael ei fesur, mae Bledd yn deffro i ddarganfod efallai ei fod wedi tyfu gormod. After being measured, Bledd wakes up to discover he may have grown too much.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero'n mynd ar wibdaith i'r anialwch ac yn dysgu pa mor bwysig ydy dwr i bopeth byw. Blero's thirsty for an adventure so he goes to Ocido to solve the mystery of the dried-up oasis

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Deian a Loli heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Deian and Loli's world today?

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gwyneth Gwrtaith yn cynnal te prynhawn. Ond mae pethau'n mynd yn anniben iawn pan bod gyrr o wartheg yn ymyrryd. An afternoon tea turns into chaos when a herd of cows turn up. [SL]

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd: awn ar wyliau byr yng Nghymru. Dau griw, dwy gyllideb wahanol: sut hwyl gawn nhw? New series. Two crews, two different budgets: who will have the most fun? First up: Brecon. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Y cyflwynydd Lara Catrin a'r trefnydd proffesiynol Gwenan Rosser sy'n rhoi trefn ar gypyrddau dillad a llofftydd Cymru. This week: decluttering Llio Thomas's wardrobe in Pen Llyn. [SL]

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
programme.desc: Sir 5 ar y daith yw Sir Gr, Sir Gaerfyrddin. Awn i Gaerfyrddin, Llanelli, Talacharn, Llansteffan, Mynydd Du, Drefach a Llandysul. We end our journey in Carmarthenshire and Ceredigion. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Dysga Alun sut mae'r sychder diweddara yn effeithio ar fferm yn y canolbarth, a Meinir sy'n clywed hanes beiciwr rhyngwladol. As the FUW celebrates its 70th, Nia visits its former president. [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Scott Quinnell sy'n teithio Cymru yn troi ei law at bob math o weithgareddau a phrofiadau amrywiol. New series with Scott Quinnell. In this episode, he fishes, skates and beatboxes! [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Down ni i nabod y ddynes tu l i'r tannau, Elinor Bennett - gwleidydd, cyfreithwraig, gwraig a mam annwyl. This time we chat to harpist, Elinor Bennett - politician, lawyer, wife and mother. [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Dim Lle
programme.desc: Ffocws ar y broblem o le, wrth i ysbytai'r gogledd droi at drin cleifion yng nghefn ambiwlansys. A look at the problems arising from the lack of space at Ysbyty Gwynedd and Maelor, Wrexham. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Tro hwn, aiff Eifion, Alys, Meriel a Gareth ni ar deithiau i Lyn y Fan Fach, Llangrannog, Cei Newydd, a Moel Eilio. We take trips to Llyn y Fan Fach, Llangrannog, New Quay and Snowdonia. [SL]

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn ystod oes pan mae bywyd gwyllt o dan fygythiad difrifol, edrycha Iolo ar gyflwr natur Cymru. During an age in which wildlife is under threat, Iolo looks at the state of Wales' nature. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Sioned yn dangos sut i luosogi planhigion efo torriadau gwaelodol, ac Adam yn trwsblannu yn yr ardd lysiau. In Pant y Wennol, Meinir creates a large planter out of an old filing cabinet. [SL]

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Cyfres wedi'i chyflwyno gan Heledd Cynwal, gyda llu o arbenigwyr wrth gefn. Cawn helpu 4 teulu sy'n ysu am gael gi - pa fath fydd yn eu siwtio? We help 4 families find their perfect dog.

programme.desc: Rhan o gyngherddau Eisteddfod Genedlaethol Cymru 2023 o Lwyfan y Maes - cyfle i fwynhau cerddoriaeth gan y Candelas. A chance to enjoy the Candelas set from the National Eisteddfod 2023.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae chwech o gynhyrchwyr ac entrepreneuriaid bwyd yn cystadlu am 5K a chynllun mentora unigryw. New series. Six food entrepreneurs compete for the 5K and a mentoring scheme.

programme.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
programme.desc: Cyfres gydag Ifan Jones Evans yn cymryd golwg ar archif un o gyfresi mwyaf eiconig S4C. Join Ifan Jones Evans as he dips into the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

programme.title: Tafwyl '24: Uchafbwyntiau Sul
programme.desc: Mae Huw Stephens, Tara Bethan a Lloyd Lewis ym Mharc Bute yn un o ddigwyddiadau mwyaf cyffrous Cymru. Tafwyl coverage, with musical performances in the hidden garden, and a set by Gwilym.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Trip i'r brifddinas sy'n galw'r tro ma wrth i Beti a Huw aros yn Parador 44, gwesty a redir gan deulu'r Owens. This time: a trip to family hotel, Parador 44.and a pop-in to Clwb Ifor Bach.

programme.title: Man Who Cheated Himself
programme.desc: 1950. Crime. Director: Felix E. Feist. Stars Lee J. Cobb, Jane Wyatt & John Dall. A homicide detective who witnesses his girlfriend kill her husband is assigned to the case, alongside his brother. [S]

programme.title: Slave Girls
programme.desc: 1967. Adventure. Director: Michael Carreras. Stars Martine Beswick, Edina Ronay & Michael Latimer. A hunter stumbles into a lost Amazon civilisation where blondes have been enslaved by brunettes. [S]

programme.title: Who is Killing the Great Chefs of Europe? 1978
programme.desc: Comedy. Directed by Ted Kotcheff. Stars George Segal, Jacqueline Bisset & Robert Morley. Mystery abounds when one by one, the greatest chefs in Europe are being killed. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: Ordeal on Locust Street. 1959. Stars Augusta Dabney, David Lewis & Suzanne Lloyd. A young man gets a terrible fright when he discovers what's in the locked room of his fiance's family mansion. [S]

programme.title: Enter Inspector Duval
programme.desc: 1962. Crime Drama. Directed by Max Varnel. Stars Anton Diffring, Diane Hart & Mark Singleton. Inspector Duval comes to London to help crack the case of a socialite murdered during a jewel heist. [S]

programme.title: Signs of the Times: Peculiar Posts
programme.desc: 1946. An intriguing short film about the strange and unusual objects that have been sent by post.

programme.title: Desert Mice
programme.desc: 1959. Comedy. Set in WW2, this is the story of an ENSA troupe of entertainers. Starring Sid James, Dora Bryan, Alfred Marks and Liz Fraser. [S]

programme.title: The Scamp
programme.desc: 1957. Crime drama directed by Wolf Rilla and starring Richard Attenborough, Dorothy Alison, Colin Petersen. Todd Dawson is a ten year old waif with a drunken scallywag for a father. [S]

programme.title: Petula Clark
programme.desc: A delightful lost reel featuring performances of 'O O Sheriff' and 'Hello Dolly' from the brilliant Petula Clark.

programme.title: What Every Woman Wants
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Brian Rix, Prunella Scales & Joan Sims. A newlywed couple with no home are forced to live with their parents and are never permitted a moment's privacy. [S]

programme.title: Our Inheritance
programme.desc: 1945. A nostalgic look back at rebuilding the country after the war in 1945.

programme.title: Parade
programme.desc: 1974. Comedy. Directed by Jacques Tati. Stars Karl Kossmayer, Michele Brabo & Bertil Berglund. A tremendous spectacle combining music, circus acts and pantomime, hosted by comedian Jacques Tati. [S]

programme.title: La Joie De Vivre
programme.desc: 1934. An animated short film where two woodland sprites dance about, atop power lines and among flowers and leaves, while being pursued.

programme.title: Eight O'Clock Walk (1954)
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by: Lance Comfort Stars: Richard Attenborough, Cathy O'Donnell & Maurice Denham. A taxi-driver is accused of murdering an eight-year-old girl on a derelict bomb-site. [S]

programme.title: Please Sir!
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Directed by Mark Stuart. Stars John Alderton, Deryck Guyler, & Joan Sanderson. Film version of the TV sitcom. Teacher Bernard Hedges takes his Fenn Street class to a holiday camp. [S]

programme.title: The Last Escape
programme.desc: 1970. Action. Directed by Walter Grauman. Stars Martin Jarvis, Margit Saad & Stuart Whitman. An American officer joins British soldiers trying to rescue a German scientist from the Nazis. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Gulf Breeze UFO Incident. 1996. On November 11th 1987, a new storm hit the town of Gulf Breeze which changed the lives of some of the residents forever. Michael Aspel explores the unusual story. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: A dark cloud surrounds the Cellar Club tonight as Caroline Munro presents two chilling features. First up, is the mysterious 1971 episode of Doomwatch - Public Enemy. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: Public Enemy. 1971. Stars Simon Oates, Trevor Bannister & Glyn Houston. The team investigate a factory that may be poisoning the environment - and may have already claimed the life of a young boy. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro returns with a murderous tale, bringing into the club the suspenseful 1959 horror 'Horrors of the Black Museum', directed by Arthur Crabtree. [S]

programme.title: Horrors of the Black Museum
programme.desc: 1959. Horror. Director: Arthur Crabtree. Stars Michael Gough, June Cunningham, Graham Curnow. After a series of murders, crime writer, Edward Bancroft, is following events with particular interest.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for a look at next week's gripping features. [S]

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. 1988. Drama. Stars Michael Caine, Armand Assante & Ray McAnally. Chief Inspector Frederick Abberline is assigned to investigate the murder of a prostitute in the East End of London. [S]

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. 1988. Drama. Stars Michael Caine, Armand Assante & Ray McAnally. Chief Inspector Frederick Abberline is assigned to investigate the murder of a prostitute in the East End of London. [S]

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. 1988. Drama. Stars Michael Caine, Armand Assante & Ray McAnally. The killer is nicknamed 'Jack the Ripper' after a letter is forwarded to Scotland Yard. [S]

programme.title: Ruth Ellis and the Mystery Lover
programme.desc: 1977. Captivating documentary about Ruth Ellis, the last woman to be hanged in Britain. Featuring the only interview with Desmond Cussen, who reflects on his life with Ruth, and her death.

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Struggle for a Planet. 1964. Narrator: Sir Michael Redgrave. In 1943, occupied Europe is ruled by Nazi puppets. The German's batter against Russia, the British and Americans battle the Japanese. [S]

programme.title: Sing As You Swing
programme.desc: 1937. Musical. Directed by Redd Davis. Starring Evelyn Dall, Claude Dampier & Lu Ann Meredith. Top British radio stars perform in this musical revue. [S]

programme.title: BFI: A Message From Mars
programme.desc: 1913. Sci-Fi. Director: J. Wallett Waller. The first silent British sci-fi feature (with new score). A Martian visits earth to cure a selfish man (similar to 'A Christmas Carol') on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Walking Lake of Jupiter. 1963. Stars Libby Morris & Murray Kash. Scientists on Jupiter learn that water from a lake on the planet has the power to cause inanimate objects to move. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Deep Freeze. 1966. Stars Adam West, Otto Preminger & Kem Dibbs. As public animosity mounts, Batman and Robin hang up their capes. Meanwhile, Mr. Freeze decides to blackmail Gotham City. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Strange Monks of Latroun. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Alister Williamson & Olaf Pooley. Richard investigates a murder and robbery committed by the so-called monks of the Latroun Monastery. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: Keep It Cool. 1961. Stars Graydon Gould & David Graham. Dr Beaker is escorting a dangerous load of explosives when Masterspy sets a trap that forces the truck to become lost then disabled. [S]

programme.title: Seventy Deadly Pills
programme.desc: 1964. Family. Director: Pat Jackson. Stars: Gareth Robinson, Len Jones & Sally Thomsett. A gang of children, 'The Rockets' have their clubhouse used by a pair of villains on the run. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Edge and the Point. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Michael Gough & John Arnatt. After defeating Will Scarlet and then Robin Hood in combat, a crusader offers his services to the Deputy Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: The Giant Claw
programme.desc: 1957. Sci-fi. Directed by Fred F. Sears. Stars Jeff Morrow, Mara Corday & Morris Ankrum. A giant extraterrestrial bird arrives on Earth and leaves a trail of death and destruction in its wake. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Aerialist. 1959. Starring: John Newland, Mike Connors & Yvette Vickers. An argument between trapeze artists results in an accident in which one is paralysed, and the other is torn by guilt. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Julian Bond. Mr Parkes (Terence Seward), a playboy, & Mrs Aston (Marsha Fitzalan), wife of a Whitehall official, are threatened by the Drew Brothers (Ernie Drew by Bernard Kay).

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Flight 104. 1968. Stars Francis Matthews & David Healy. When the Mysterons threaten to sabotage a conference in Switzerland, Scarlet and Blue are assigned to escort the world's leading astrophysicist.

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1958. Crime of Honour. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Russell Napier, Ivan Craig and Jean Lodge. A Thames Estuary dredger drags a man's body from the bed of the river. (S1, E28)

programme.title: Lord Jim
programme.desc: 1965. Adventure. Directed by Richard Brooks. Stars James Mason, Peter O'Toole & Curt Jurgens. A discredited seaman, desperately seeking to redeem himself, agrees to deliver a dangerous shipment. [S]

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: General Stories 2. 1976. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Billy Dainty, Clive Dunn, Liza Goddard, Yootha Joyce, Bernard Manning, Jack Parnell & Mike Reid. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Prey. 1978. Stars Tommy Boyle & Deidre Costello. Maureen always complained to the police - so much that they stopped listening. The pity is, if they hadn't, she might still be alive today. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1971. A Lesson In War. Created by John Finch. Stars Keith Drinkel & David Swift. Philip and a Polish comrade capture a German soldier in the Western Desert. (S2, E03) [S]

programme.title: A Dandy in Aspic
programme.desc: 1968. Thriller. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Mia Farrow, Laurence Harvey, Tom Courtenay. British Intelligence orders its operatives to eliminate a Soviet spy, unaware he's one of their own men. [S]

programme.title: Run for the Sun
programme.desc: 1956. Thriller. Directed by Roy Boulting. Stars Jane Greer, Richard Widmark & Trevor Howard. An author and a journalist find themselves at the mercy of wanted war criminals in the Mexican jungle. [S]
